title: "Deep learning models can improve low-field MRI images for better clinical diagnoses"
excerpt: "While low-field MRI scans have several logistical advantages, 64mT scans can also present discrepancies affecting the clinical diagnosis. For example, diagnosing certain conditions such as hydrocephalus critically depends on the precise estimation of brain morphometric measurements."
